key.mssql: SELECT a.id as id,(b.objname+'.'+a.labelname) as labelname from formfield a,forminfo b where a.formid = b.id and a.formid in(#) and a.fieldtype in (#) order by b.id desc
key.oracle: SELECT a.id as id,(b.objname || '.' || a.labelname) as labelname from formfield a,forminfo b where a.formid = b.id and a.formid in(#) and a.fieldtype in (#) and a.isdelete=0 order by b.id desc
key.db2: SELECT a.id as id,(b.objname || '.' || a.labelname) as labelname from formfield a,forminfo b where a.formid = b.id and a.formid in(#) and a.fieldtype in (#) order by b.id desc

key.mssql: from Attendance where substring(date1,1,10)='#' and hrmid='#' and attendance=#
key.oracle: from Attendance where substr(date1,1,10)='#' and hrmid='#' and attendance=#
key.db2: from Attendance where substr(date1,1,10)='#' and hrmid='#' and attendance=#

key.mssql: and substring(date1,12,9)>'#'
key.oracle: and substr(date1,12,9)>'#'
key.db2: and substr(date1,12,9)>'#'

key.mssql: and substring(date1,12,9)>'#'
key.oracle: and substr(date1,12,9)>'#'
key.db2: and substr(date1,12,9)>'#'

key.mssql: where oid='#' and CHARINDEX(col1,'#')>-1
key.oracle: where oid='#' and instr(col1,'#')>-1
key.db2: where oid='#' and locate('#',col1)>0

key.mssql: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substring(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#' and substring(date1,12,9)
key.oracle: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substr(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#' and substr(date1,12,9)
key.db2: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substr(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#' and substr(date1,12,9)

key.mssql: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substring(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#'
key.oracle: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substr(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#'
key.db2: select count(*) as nums from Attendance where hrmid='#' and substr(date1,1,10) between '#' and '#'

key.mssql: exec sp_rename @objname='#.#', @newname='#', @objtype='column'
key.oracle: alter table # rename column # to #
key.db2: alter table # rename column # to #

key.mssql: alter table # ALTER COLUMN # VARCHAR(#)
key.oracle: alter table # modify # VARCHAR2(#)
key.db2: alter table # alter # set data type varchar(#)

key.mssql: alter table # ALTER COLUMN # numeric(24,#)
key.oracle: alter table # modify # number(24,#)
key.db2: alter table # alter # set data type DECIMAL(24,#)

key.mssql: alter table # drop column #
key.oracle: alter table # drop column #
key.db2: alter table # drop column #

key.mssql: select top 50 d.id,count(*) c
key.oracle: select d.id,count(*) c
key.db2: select d.id,count(*) c

key.oracle: and rownum < 51
key.db2: fetch first 50 rows only

key.mssql: operatedate+' '+operatortime
key.oracle: operatedate||' '||operatortime
key.db2: operatedate||' '||operatortime

key.mssql: select requestid,operatedate+' '+operatortime as feedtime from requestlog where logtype='297e269b2d5a04ba012d5a31ef5e0072' and isfeedbackread='0' and operator='#' order by operatedate desc,operatortime desc
key.oracle: select requestid,operatedate||' '||operatortime as feedtime from requestlog where logtype='297e269b2d5a04ba012d5a31ef5e0072' and isfeedbackread='0' and operator='#' order by operatedate desc,operatortime desc
key.db2: select requestid,operatedate||' '||operatortime as feedtime from requestlog where logtype='297e269b2d5a04ba012d5a31ef5e0072' and isfeedbackread='0' and operator='#' order by operatedate desc,operatortime desc

key.mssql: select distinct b.id from sysuser a,humres b,permissiondetail d,nodeinfo e where a.isclosed != 1 and (a.objid = b.id or (a.objid is not null and b.station like '%'+a.objid+'%')) and (d.userid = b.id or (d.stationid is not null and b.station like '%'+d.stationid+'%') or (( d.isalluser=1 or (d.orgid is not null and b.orgid like '%'+d.orgid+'%' )) and d.minseclevel <=b.seclevel and (((d.maxseclevel is not null) and (b.seclevel <=d.maxseclevel)) or (d.maxseclevel is null)))) and d.objid = e.id and e.nodetype = 1 and e.isdelete < 1 and e.workflowid = '#'
key.oracle: select distinct b.id from sysuser a,humres b,permissiondetail d,nodeinfo e where a.isclosed != 1 and (a.objid = b.id or (a.objid is not null and b.station like '%'||a.objid||'%')) and (d.userid = b.id or (d.stationid is not null and b.station like '%'||d.stationid||'%') or (( d.isalluser=1 or (d.orgid is not null and b.orgid like '%'||d.orgid||'%' )) and d.minseclevel <=b.seclevel and (((d.maxseclevel is not null) and (b.seclevel <=d.maxseclevel)) or (d.maxseclevel is null)))) and d.objid = e.id and e.nodetype = 1 and e.isdelete < 1 and e.workflowid = '#'
key.db2: select distinct b.id from sysuser a,humres b,permissiondetail d,nodeinfo e where a.isclosed != 1 and (a.objid = b.id or (a.objid is not null and locate(a.objid,b.station)> 0)) and (d.userid = b.id or (d.stationid is not null and locate(d.stationid,b.station)>0 ) or (( d.isalluser=1 or (d.orgid is not null and locate(d.orgid,b.orgid)>0 )) and d.minseclevel <=b.seclevel and (((d.maxseclevel is not null) and (b.seclevel <=d.maxseclevel)) or (d.maxseclevel is null)))) and d.objid = e.id and e.nodetype = 1 and e.isdelete < 1 and e.workflowid = '#'

key.mssql: select distinct a.id from Permissiondetail c,Humres a where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'+c.orgid+'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and objid = '#' and opttype =9
key.oracle: select distinct a.id from Permissiondetail c,Humres a where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'||c.stationid||'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'||c.orgid||'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and objid = '#' and opttype =9
key.db2: select distinct a.id from Permissiondetail c,Humres a where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and locate(c.stationid,a.station)>0 ) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and locate(c.orgid,a.orgid)>0 )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and objid = '#' and opttype =9

key.mssql: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids' and o.id is not null and subjectids like '%'+o.id+'%')
key.oracle: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids' and o.id is not null and subjectids like '%'||o.id||'%')
key.db2: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids' and o.id is not null and locate(o.id,subjectids)>0 )

key.mssql: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids_v' and o.id is not null and subjectids like '%'+o.id+'%')
key.oracle: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids_v' and o.id is not null and subjectids like '%'||o.id||'%')
key.db2: select o from Orgunit o,Orgunitlink l where o.id = l.oid and o.isdelete != 1 and exists (select 'X' from Orgsubjectlink where orgid='orgids_v' and o.id is not null and locate(o.id,subjectids)>0 )

key.mssql: from Workflowinfo where id = '#' and isactive = '1' and id in (select n.workflowid from Permissiondetail p ,nodeinfo n where ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.stationid+'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.orgid+'%')) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( maxseclevel is not null) and (#<= maxseclevel)) or (maxseclevel is null))))) and opttype=2 and p.objid = n.id )
key.oracle: from Workflowinfo where id = '#' and isactive = '1' and id in (select n.workflowid from Permissiondetail p ,nodeinfo n where ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.stationid||'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.orgid||'%')) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( maxseclevel is not null) and (#<= maxseclevel)) or (maxseclevel is null))))) and opttype=2 and p.objid = n.id )
key.db2: from Workflowinfo where id = '#' and isactive = '1' and id in (select n.workflowid from Permissiondetail p ,nodeinfo n where ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and locate(p.stationid,'#')>0) or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and locate(p.orgid,'#')>0 )) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( maxseclevel is not null) and (#<= maxseclevel)) or (maxseclevel is null))))) and opttype=2 and p.objid = n.id )

key.mssql: where a.id = b.userid and d.id=b.roleid and ((a.objid = c.id and a.mtype=1) or (a.objid is not null and c.station like '%'+a.objid+'%' and a.mtype=2))
key.oracle: where a.id = b.userid and d.id=b.roleid and ((a.objid = c.id and a.mtype=1) or (a.objid is not null and c.station like '%'||a.objid||'%' and a.mtype=2))
key.db2: where a.id = b.userid and d.id=b.roleid and ((a.objid = c.id and a.mtype=1) or (a.objid is not null and locate(a.objid,c.station)>0 and a.mtype=2))

key.mssql: select u from Sysuser u,Humres h where u.objid is not null and h.station like '%'+u.objid+'%' and u.mtype=2 and h.id='#'
key.oracle: select u from Sysuser u,Humres h where u.objid is not null and h.station like '%'||u.objid||'%' and u.mtype=2 and h.id='#'
key.db2: select u from Sysuser u,Humres h where u.objid is not null and locate(u.objid,h.station)>0 and u.mtype=2 and h.id='#'

key.mssql: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and h.station like '%'+su.objid+'%' and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#'
key.oracle: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and h.station like '%'||su.objid||'%' and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#'
key.db2: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and locate(su.objid,h.station)>0 and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#'

key.mssql: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and h.station like '%'+su.objid+'%' and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#' and rl.roleid='#'
key.oracle: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and h.station like '%'||su.objid||'%' and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#' and rl.roleid='#'
key.db2: select distinct rl from Sysuserrolelink rl,Sysuser su,Humres h where su.id = rl.userid and ((su.objid = h.id and su.mtype=1) or (su.objid is not null and locate(su.objid,h.station)>0 and su.mtype=2)) and su.id = '#' and rl.roleid='#'

key.mssql: (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.stationid+'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.orgid+'%'))
key.oracle: (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.stationid||'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.orgid||'%'))
key.db2: (p.stationid is not null and locate(p.stationid,'#')>0) or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and locate(p.orgid,'#')>0 ))

key.mssql: where ((p.userid = h.id) or (p.stationid is not null and h.station like '%'+p.stationid+'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and h.orgid like '%'+p.orgid+'%' ))
key.oracle: where ((p.userid = h.id) or (p.stationid is not null and h.station like '%'||p.stationid||'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and h.orgid like '%'||p.orgid||'%' ))
key.db2: where ((p.userid = h.id) or (p.stationid is not null and locate(p.stationid,h.station)>0) or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and locate(p.orgid,h.orgid)>0 ))

key.mssql: (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.stationid+'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.orgid+'%'))
key.oracle: (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.stationid||'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.orgid||'%'))
key.db2: (p.stationid is not null and locate(p.stationid,'#')>0) or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and locate(p.orgid,'#')>0 ))

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and tbalias.orgids like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and tbalias.orgids like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and locate(h.oid,tbalias.orgids)>0 and h.col1 like '%#%')

key.mssql: id in (select distinct hu.id from stationinfo s,humres hu where s.id in (select distinct oid from stationlink l,humres h where l.pid is not null and h.station like '%'+l.pid+'%' and l.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and h.id = '#') and s.id is not null and hu.station like '%'+s.id+'%')
key.oracle: id in (select distinct hu.id from stationinfo s,humres hu where s.id in (select distinct oid from stationlink l,humres h where l.pid is not null and h.station like '%'||l.pid||'%' and l.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and h.id = '#') and s.id is not null and hu.station like '%'||s.id||'%')
key.db2: id in (select distinct hu.id from stationinfo s,humres hu where s.id in (select distinct oid from stationlink l,humres h where l.pid is not null and locate(l.pid,h.station)>0 and l.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and h.id = '#') and s.id is not null and locate(s.id,hu.station)>0 )

key.mssql: select h1 from Humres h1,Humres h2,Stationlink s where s.pid is not null and h2.station like '%'+s.pid+'%' and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'+s.oid+'%'
key.oracle: select h1 from Humres h1,Humres h2,Stationlink s where s.pid is not null and h2.station like '%'||s.pid||'%' and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'||s.oid||'%'
key.db2: select h1 from Humres h1,Humres h2,Stationlink s where s.pid is not null and locate(s.pid,h2.station)>0 and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and locate(s.oid,h1.station)>0

key.mssql: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'+s.oid+'%'
key.oracle: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'||s.oid||'%'
key.db2: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and locate(s.oid,h1.station)>0

key.mssql: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and h1.station not like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'+s.oid+'%' and h1.id='#'
key.oracle: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and h1.station not like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'||s.oid||'%' and h1.id='#'
key.db2: select h1 from Humres h1,Stationlink s where s.pids like '%#%' and h1.station not like '%#%' and s.oid is not null and locate(s.oid,h1.station)>0 and h1.id='#'

key.mssql: select l from Stationlink l,Stationinfo s where s.id is not null and l.pids like '%'+s.id+'%' and s.isdelete = 1
key.oracle: select l from Stationlink l,Stationinfo s where s.id is not null and l.pids like '%'||s.id||'%' and s.isdelete = 1
key.db2: select l from Stationlink l,Stationinfo s where s.id is not null and locate(s.id,l.pids)>0 and s.isdelete = 1

key.mssql: exists (select 'X' from humres h1,humres h2,stationlink s where h1.id=this_.id and s.pid is not null and h2.station like '%'+s.pid+'%' and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'+s.oid+'%')
key.oracle: exists (select 'X' from humres h1,humres h2,stationlink s where h1.id=this_.id and s.pid is not null and h2.station like '%'||s.pid||'%' and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and h1.station like '%'||s.oid||'%')
key.db2: exists (select 'X' from humres h1,humres h2,stationlink s where h1.id=this_.id and s.pid is not null and locate(s.pid,h2.station)>0 and h2.id = '#' and s.oid is not null and locate(s.oid,h1.station)>0 )

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and this_.orgids like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and this_.orgids like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and locate(h.oid,this_.orgids)>0 and h.col1 like '%#%')

key.mssql: and exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and s.orgid like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.oracle: and exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and s.orgid like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like '%#%')
key.db2: and exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.typeid = '402881e510e8223c0110e83d427f0018' and locate(h.oid,s.orgid)>0 and h.col1 like '%#%')

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and #.orgids like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and #.orgids like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and locate(h.oid,#.orgids)>0 and h.col1 like ?)

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and #.orgids like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and #.orgids like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and locate(h.oid,#.orgids)>0 and h.col1 like ?)

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where tbalias.# like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where tbalias.# like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where locate(h.oid,tbalias.#)>0 and h.col1 like ?)

key.mssql: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and tbalias.orgids like '%'+h.oid+'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.oracle: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and tbalias.orgids like '%'||h.oid||'%' and h.col1 like ?)
key.db2: exists (select h.oid from Orgunitlink h where h.oid is not null and locate(h.oid,tbalias.orgids)>0 and h.col1 like ?)

key.mssql: and upper('#') like upper('%'+#+'%')
key.oracle: and upper('#') like upper('%'||#||'%')
key.db2: and locate(#,upper('#'))>0

key.mssql: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'+c.orgid+'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#' order by c.id
key.oracle: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'||c.stationid||'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'||c.orgid||'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#' order by c.id
key.db2: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and locate(c.stationid,a.station)>0) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and locate(c.orgid,a.orgid)>0 )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#' order by c.id

key.mssql: select r.layoutid,r.layoutid1 from Permissionrule r,Permissiondetail p where r.id=p.ruleid and r.objid='#' and ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.stationid+'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'+p.orgid+'%')) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( p.maxseclevel is not null) and (# <= p.maxseclevel)) or (p.maxseclevel is null))))) order by r.priority
key.oracle: select r.layoutid,r.layoutid1 from Permissionrule r,Permissiondetail p where r.id=p.ruleid and r.objid='#' and ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.stationid||'%') or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and '#' like '%'||p.orgid||'%')) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( p.maxseclevel is not null) and (# <= p.maxseclevel)) or (p.maxseclevel is null))))) order by r.priority
key.db2: select r.layoutid,r.layoutid1 from Permissionrule r,Permissiondetail p where r.id=p.ruleid and r.objid='#' and ((p.userid='#') or (p.stationid is not null and locate(p.stationid,'#')>0 ) or (( p.isalluser=1 or (p.orgid is not null and locate(p.orgid,'#')>0 )) and (p.minseclevel <= # and ((( p.maxseclevel is not null) and (# <= p.maxseclevel)) or (p.maxseclevel is null))))) order by r.priority

key.mssql: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id,a.dsporder from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where (((a.id = c.userid or (c.stationid is not null and(a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%'))) and (c.minseclevel is null or (c.minseclevel is not null and c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel)) and (c.maxseclevel is null or (c.maxseclevel is not null and c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel))) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and(a.orgids like '%'+c.orgid+'%' ))) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and hrstatus='4028804c16acfbc00116ccba13802935' and a.isdelete=0 and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#'
key.oracle: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id,a.dsporder from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where (((a.id = c.userid or (c.stationid is not null and(a.station like '%'||c.stationid||'%'))) and (c.minseclevel is null or (c.minseclevel is not null and c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel)) and (c.maxseclevel is null or (c.maxseclevel is not null and c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel))) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and(a.orgids like '%'||c.orgid||'%' ))) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and hrstatus='4028804c16acfbc00116ccba13802935' and a.isdelete=0 and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#'
key.db2: select distinct a.id,c.wfopttype,a.seclevel,c.id,a.dsporder from Humres a,Requestoptrule c where (((a.id = c.userid or (c.stationid is not null and(locate(c.stationid,a.station)>0))) and (c.minseclevel is null or (c.minseclevel is not null and c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel)) and (c.maxseclevel is null or (c.maxseclevel is not null and c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel))) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and(locate(c.orgid,a.orgids)>0 ))) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and hrstatus='4028804c16acfbc00116ccba13802935' and a.isdelete=0 and requestid = '#' and ruleid = '#'

key.mssql: select distinct a.id from Permissiondetail c,Humres a where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'+c.orgid+'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and objid = '#' and opttype =9 and ruleid='#'
key.oracle: select distinct a.id from Permissiondetail c,Humres a where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and a.station like '%'||c.stationid||'%') or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and a.orgid like '%'||c.orgid||'%' )) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and objid = '#' and opttype =9 and ruleid='#'

key.mssql: upper('#') like upper('%'+categoryids+'%')
key.oracle: upper('#') like upper('%'||categoryids||'%')
key.db2: locate(upper(categoryids),upper('#'))>0

key.mssql: extrefobjfield15='#' or (exists (select 'X' from (select oid from stationlink where pid in(#) ) tmp where tbalias.station like '%'+tmp.oid+'%' ))
key.oracle: extrefobjfield15='#' or (exists (select 'X' from (select oid from stationlink where pid in(#) ) tmp where tbalias.station like '%'||tmp.oid||'%' ))
key.db2: extrefobjfield15='#' or (exists (select 'X' from (select oid from stationlink where pid in(#) ) tmp where locate(tmp.oid,tbalias.station)>0 ))

key.mssql: select distinct a.id from Humres a,permissiondetail c where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and(a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%')) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and(a.orgids like '%'+c.orgid+'%' ))) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and a.hrstatus='4028804c16acfbc00116ccba13802935' and a.isdelete=0 and c.objid='#' and c.opttype=6

key.mssql: select distinct a.id from Humres a,permissiondetail c where ((a.id = c.userid) or (c.stationid is not null and(a.station like '%'+c.stationid+'%')) or ((c.isalluser = 1 or (c.orgid is not null and(a.orgids like '%'+c.orgid+'%' ))) and (c.minseclevel <= a.seclevel and ( ( (c.maxseclevel is not null) and (c.maxseclevel >= a.seclevel) ) or (c.maxseclevel is null) ) ))) and a.hrstatus='4028804c16acfbc00116ccba13802935' and a.isdelete=0 and c.objid='#' and c.opttype=6 and a.id not in(select creator from indagateremark where requestid=c.objid)

key.mssql: select top 20 h.id as id,h.objname as name,o.objname as org, count(distinct wb.id) as sum from requestbase wb, requestoperators wo,requeststatus wi,humres h,orgunit o where wb.isdelete!=1 and wb.id = wo.requestid and wi.curstepid=wo.stepid and wo.userid=h.id and h.isdelete=0 and h.orgid=o.id and wb.isfinished=0 and (wi.isreceived=0 or wi.issubmited=0) and wi.ispaused=0 group by h.id, h.objname, o.objname order by sum desc
key.oracle: select id,name,org,sum from(select h.id as id,h.objname as name,o.objname as org, count(distinct wb.id) as sum from requestbase wb, requestoperators wo,requeststatus wi,humres h,orgunit o where wb.isdelete!=1 and wb.id = wo.requestid and wi.curstepid=wo.stepid and wo.userid=h.id and h.isdelete=0 and h.orgid=o.id and wb.isfinished=0 and (wi.isreceived=0 or wi.issubmited=0) and wi.ispaused=0 group by h.id, h.objname, o.objname order by sum desc)where rownum <=20
key.db2: select h.id as id,h.objname as name,o.objname as org, count(distinct wb.id) as sum from requestbase wb, requestoperators wo,requeststatus wi,humres h,orgunit o where wb.isdelete!=1 and wb.id = wo.requestid and wi.curstepid=wo.stepid and wo.userid=h.id and h.isdelete=0 and h.orgid=o.id and wb.isfinished=0 and (wi.isreceived=0 or wi.issubmited=0) and wi.ispaused=0 group by h.id, h.objname, o.objname order by sum desc fetch first 20 rows only

key.mssql: select id,objname as name, sum(a1) as a1,sum(a2) as a2,sum(a3) as a3 from(select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, count(*)as a1,0 as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, count(*) as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=1 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, 0 as a2,count(*) as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=0 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 )group by id, objname order by a1 desc
key.oracle: select id,name,a1,a2,a3 from(select id,objname as name, sum(a1) as a1,sum(a2) as a2,sum(a3) as a3 from(select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, count(*)as a1,0 as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, count(*) as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=1 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, 0 as a2,count(*) as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=0 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 )group by id, objname order by a1 desc)where rownum <=20
key.db2: select id,objname as name, sum(a1) as a1,sum(a2) as a2,sum(a3) as a3 from(select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, count(*)as a1,0 as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, count(*) as a2,0 as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=1 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 union select w.id as id,w.objname as objname, 0 as a1, 0 as a2,count(*) as a3 from workflowinfo w,requestbase r where r.isfinished=0 and w.id=r.workflowid and r.isdelete=0 group by w.id, w.objname, 0, 0 )group by id, objname order by a1 desc

key.mssql: select id,hr,org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select h.id as id,h.objname as hr, o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname, o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by id,hr,org order by s1 desc
key.oracle: select id,hr,org,s1,s2,s3 from(select id,hr,org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select h.id as id,h.objname as hr, o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname, o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by id,hr,org order by s1 desc)where rownum <=20
key.db2: select id,hr,org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select h.id as id,h.objname as hr, o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname, o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 union select h.id as id,h.objname as hr,o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by h.id,h.objname,o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by id,hr,org order by s1 desc

key.mssql: select org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by org order by s1 desc
key.oracle: select org,s1,s2,s3 from(select org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by org order by s1 desc)where rownum <=20
key.db2: select org,sum(s1)as s1,sum(s2)as s2,sum(s3)as s3 from (select o.objname as org,count(*) as s1,0 as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,count(*) as s2,0 as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=1 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 union select o.objname as org,0 as s1,0 as s2,count(*) as s3 from requestbase r,humres h,orgunit o where r.isdelete=0 and r.isfinished=0 and r.creater=h.id and h.orgid=o.id group by o.objname, 0, 0 ) group by org order by s1 desc

key.mssql: select id, objname from (select '' id,' ' objname union (select id,objname from selectitem where pid = '"+elementvalue+"')) t order by id desc
key.oracle: select id,objname from (select '' id,' ' objname from dual union (select id,objname from selectitem where pid = '"+elementvalue+"')) t order by id desc
key.db2: select id,objname from (select '' id,' ' objname from SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 union (select id,objname from selectitem where pid = '"+elementvalue+"')) order by id desc
